title: *1 Month FREE!* Brand New Luxury Property, Without the Luxury Price!
map_address: Old San Antonio Rd near S H I-35 Frontage Road
posting_body: *After the 1 month free special this unit has a prorated rent of $1,374*
Check out this brand new luxury apartment without the luxury price!
If you're balling on a budget but still want to have a awesome place to call home, this is the spot for you.
With a private dog park and tons of green areas, your four legged friends will get all the exercise they need.
Hosting a large resort-style pool for swimming laps...or lounging on food-shaped floats you can stay cool in the summer months.
They have a huge 24 hour fitness room, community garden and a game room so you're sure to never be bored!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
